channel.title: post on R Hugo Papercss site template
channel.description: Recent content in post on R Hugo Papercss site template

item.title: Create Post
item.description:
Create a post using

hugo new --kind r-bundle post/mytitle

For now this will create a skeleton post under content/post/mytitle/index.md.

For now hugo will not render .rmd files.

If you want the code to be run you need to adjust the extension to .rmd Of course you can create your own index.rmd from scratch as well.
